meta.title: Connections Academy | Online Public School from Home

meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.content: Connections Academy is a K-12 education program that offers virtual learning from home. Learn more about how online public school can benefit your family.

a.title: For enrollment help, call us now at 1-800-382-6010

li.a: Is Online Schooling Right for You?
Explore a Day in the Life

br.p: This website is not compatible with Internet Explorer 8 or below. Please upgrade to the latest version here. This link will open in a new window.

img.alt: Find A School In Your Zip Code

div.p: Enter your ZIP code to see available schools.
Enter your ZIP code below to see if there is one in your state.

input.name: dnn$ctr888$View$ctl02$zip
input.data-bind: value: searchValue, onEnter: search, css: { 'has-error': !validFiveDigitZip() }, attr: { 'aria-invalid': !validFiveDigitZip() }

div.br: Discover the online school that breaks the mold.
Find out what our virtual learning program offers.
Ready to go? Start your online registration now!

div.p: Connections Academy's tuition-free online public K–12 school partners with parents to provide students with an engaging, high-quality education in a safe learning environment. See how our schools can prepare your child for success in school and into the future!
of parents would recommend Connections Academy to other families.
95% of our parents say that their children are satisfied with our programs and are pleased with their child’s academic growth.

div.blockquote: This school is perfect for my son. He has improved dramatically not only in his studies but also in his overall health. He is more outgoing, likes to do his classwork, and is more motivated to do his classwork. This school is the best of the best.

div.h4: Online school graduate earning firefigther stripes
div.p: Colorado Connections Academy graduate Samantha Sparrows-Bagley used the flexibility of online school to follow in her father's footsteps

div.h4: Seniors reflect on their online school experience
div.p: Oregon Connections Academy grads Alia Gapay and Garrett Kincaid share how online school prepared them for future success!

div.h4: Connections Academy Online Schools Celebrate High School Graduation Nationwide
div.p: Over 7,500 seniors embark on next learning journey: college, career, military and more
